Graphic.text: I like design and I am so interested in studying many software. I want to learn some new technology to catch up the society. I think I will apply those design skills in my future job..

Education.text: I will be your professional consultant in educational field. No matter how you want to run in educational field, I can provide my experted skills for you.

Video.text: I have a good feeling for dynamic images or videos, because I have a good feeling for music or shots. I have done screenwriting for a long time in the past, and I have a good musical foundation. So the video I edited has a good visual sense. This is one of my best skills.

Writing.text: I am goot at English writing and the speed of my writing is the same speed as my mother language. I also got 2 years working experience as an editor.

Marketing.text: I have talent on marketing because my family members have so many businessmen. I have taken the Business-Marketing at Fanshawe. My marketing thinking can help you look for your target groups in for selling your products.
